achievements.title: 3... 2... 1... Liftoff!
achievements.desc: You've taken one small step for man, not such a giant leap for mankind.

achievements.title: The Earth Looks So Small from Up Here
achievements.desc: You're finally outside the atmosphere, but there's still a lot to explore.

achievements.title: Interstellar Traveler
achievements.desc: You've traveled vast interstellar distances and seen many galaxies in your way.

achievements.title: Emperor of the Universe
achievements.desc: You're the ruler of the whole Universe. There's no one with more power than you.
